title: 401(k) Calculator | High-Accuracy Retirement Growth & Employer Match

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Yearly salary: S_y = S_0 (1 + g)^y Employee contribution (percent mode): C_{emp,y} = \min\left(r \cdot S_y,\ L_{def,y} + L_{catch,y}\right) Employer match: C_{er,y} = \min\left(C_{emp,y},\ S_y \cdot c\right) \cdot m Annual additions cap: C_{cap,y} = L_{ann,y}; if (C_{er,y} + \min(C_{emp,y}, L_{def,y}) > C_{cap,y}) then reduce C_{er,y} accordingly. Balance update (net of fees): B_{y+1} = \left(B_y + C_{emp,y} + C_{er,y}\right) \cdot \left(1 + \frac{R - F}{100}\right) Real balance (todayâ€™s dollars): B^{real}_Y = \dfrac{B_Y}{(1 + \frac{I}{100})^Y} Estimated annual income: I_{ret} = B_Y \cdot \dfrac{w}{100}; monthly = \dfrac{I_{ret}}{12}

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
